Course.title: Course
Course.description: Represents a course offered by Spruce Life Skills.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Course entity.

description.description: A detailed description of the course.

category.description: The category that the course belongs to (e.g., NEP).

imageUrl.description: URL of the image representing the course.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile, including their enrolled courses and membership status.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

enrolledCourseIds.description: An array of course IDs that the user is enrolled in.

lastEnrolledAt.description: Timestamp of the last enrollment activity.

membershipStatus.description: The current status of the user's membership.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this membership.

status.description: The current status of the membership.

startDate.description: The start date of the current billing period.

endDate.description: The end date of the current billing period.

definition.description: Stores user profile information, including enrolled courses and membership status.
Stores a user's membership subscription details.

params.name: membershipId
params.description: Unique ID for the membership record.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore data structure supports both individual course enrollments and a new membership model. Memberships are stored in a sub-collection under each user, which provides a secure and scalable way to manage subscriptions. The 'membershipStatus' on the UserProfile provides a quick way to check if a user is an active member without needing to query the sub-collection.
